abstract: In what was largely a battle of repeats, Fox edged past CBS for first place in the ratings Monday night as reruns of “Bones” and “House” led their time slots by slim margins ahead of CBS’s sitcoms.
snippet: In what was largely a battle of repeats, Fox edged past CBS for first place in the ratings Monday night as reruns of “Bones” and “House” led their time slots by slim margins ahead of CBS’s sitcoms.
lead_paragraph: In what was largely a battle of repeats, Fox edged past CBS for first place in the ratings Monday night as reruns of “Bones” and “House” led their time slots by slim margins ahead of CBS’s sitcoms. According to Nielsen’s estimates, the two Fox shows delivered 6.3 million and 7.4 million viewers, respectively, at 8 and 9 p.m.

headline.main: Fox Edges Out CBS in a Battle of Reruns
